health_data_information_systems_summary: Discussions were held about the conditions of health data collection and management at Nasha and Wakulima Markets in Nakuru. The Committee made observations and recommendations regarding the management of health data in these markets.
health_data_challenges: The challenges identified include issues with hygiene, sanitation, revenue collection, and infrastructure at the Nasha and Wakulima Markets.
health_service_delivery_improvement_reco: Recommendations include supervision and accountability for washroom fees, guidelines for utilization of fees, improvement of market infrastructure, provision of offloading bay, and administrative actions against non-performing officers.
